definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 29:11 missive, document, writing, book (prob. ancient loan-word from As. šipru, missive, message Dl:HWB 683, Tel Am. šipru, šipirtu, id. Wkl:TA Gloss; √ šâpâru, send, send message or letter Dl:HWB 683, Wkl:1.c., whence also sâpiru, writer, and (perh.) ruler, šapirûtu, rule; v. Hom:Aufsätze (1892), 34 Buhl:Lex 13; perh. cf. Ar. safara go forth to journey, II. send on a journey Lane:1370; NH [[סֵפֶר]] = BH; so Aram. [[סִיפְרָא]] sepro0; Chr Pal Aram. sypro0 Schwally:Idiot. 64; Ar. sifrun);—´[[ס]] abs. 2Sa 11:14 +; cstr. Ex 24:7 +; sf. [[סִפְרִי]] Ex 32:33, [[סִפְרְְ]] v:Ex 32:33, Ps 139:16; pl. [[סְפָרִים]] 1Ki 21:8 +;—†

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: letter of instruction, written order, commission, or request, usu. fr. king, 2Sa 11:14, 2Sa 11:15, 1Ki 21:8, 1Ki 21:8, 1Ki 21:9, 1Ki 21:11, 2Ki 5:5, 2Ki 5:6, 2Ki 5:6, 2Ki 5:7, 2Ki 10:1, 2Ki 10:2, 2Ki 10:6, 2Ki 10:7, 2Ki 19:14 = Is 37:14 cf. 2Ch 32:17, 2Ki 20:12 = Is 39:1; = written decree for publication Es 1:22, Es 3:13, Es 8:5, Es 9:20, Es 9:25, Es 9:30 ( = [[אִגֶּרֶת]] v:Es 9:25, v:Es 9:29, vid. p. 8 b supra), cf. [[וַיִּשְׁלַח]] [[סְפָרִים בְּיִד הָרָחִים בַּסּוּסִים רׂכְבֵי הָרֶכֶשׁ]] Es 8:10.—[´[[כָּתַב ס]] 2Sa 11:15, 1Ki 21:8, 2Ki 10:1, 2Ki 10:6, 2Ch 32:17; ´[[כָּתַב בַּסּ]] (of specif. contents) 2Sa 11:15, 1Ki 21:9, 1Ki 21:11; [[קָרָא]] ´[[אֶת־הַסּ]] 2Ki 5:7 read the letter].—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fr. prophet Je 29:1, other influential persons v:Je 29:25, v:Je 29:29 †. †

legal document, [[כְּרִיתֻת]] ´[[ס]] certificate of divorce De 24:1, De 24:3 and (fig.) Je 3:8, Is 50:1; [[הַמִּקְנׇה]] ´[[ס]] deed of purchase Je 32:11, Je 32:12 (del. art.), v:Je 32:12, v:Je 32:14, v:Je 32:16, cf. ´[[בַּסּ]] v:Je 32:10, [[הַסְּפָרִים]] v:Je 32:14 (si vera l.; del. LXX Gie cf. Gf), [[סֵפֶר]] v:Je 32:16; v:Je 32:44; ´[[ס]] = indictment Job 31:35 (obj. of [[כָּתַב]]; ´[[כָּתַב בְּ]] = sign Je 32:10, Je 32:12, Je 32:44).

book, or scroll, in which something is written to preserve it for future use Ex 17:14 (E), Jos 18:9 (JE), 1Sa 10:25, Is 30:8, Job 19:23 +; in form of roll, cf. [[וְנׇגׂ֫לוּ כַּסֵּפֶר הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Is 34:4, [[הֶחָתוּם]] ´[[הַסּ]] Is 29:11, Is 29:12 (v. Je 36, etc., infr.); partic.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: book of prophecies Je 25:13, Je 30:2 + 6 t. Je 36, Da 12:4; [[חֲזוֹן נַחוּם]] ´[[ס]] Na 1:1; ´[[סֵפֶר י]] Is 34:4; so [[מְגִלַּת סֵפֶר]] Je 36:2, Je 36:4 (= [[מְגִלָּה]] v:Je 36:6 + 6 t.; with many columns, [[דְּלָתוֹת]] v:Je 36:23), Ez Eze 2:9, cf. Ps 40:8.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: once [[בַּסְּפָרִים]] Da 9:2 by means of the Scriptures (canonical books) cf. Ew Meinh Bev Marti:Kau.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: God's record-book, Ps 139:16, [[זִכָּרוֹן]] ´[[ס]] Mal 3:16; God's register of living, Ex 32:32, Ex 32:33 (E), [[חַיִּים]] ´[[ס]] Ps 69:29; ´[[הַסּ]] Da 12:1 (citizens of Mess. kingdom).

´[[ס]] = book-learning, esp. writing: [[סֵּפֶר]] ([[הַ]])[[יׇדַע ]] Is 29:11, Is 29:12, Is 29:12 (of ability to read); so [[לְלַמְּדָם סֵפֶר וּלְשׁוֹן]] [[כַּשְׂדִּים]] Da 1:4 to teach them the writing and speech of the Chaldeans (on constr. v. Ges:§ 128 a); more gen. [[וְחָכְמָה]] ´[[הַשְׂכִּיל בְּכָל־ס]] v:Da 1:17.—[[[סֵפֶר]] book is joined with vbs. thus: it is written ([[יִכָּפֶב]]) Mal 3:16; a thing is written ´[[בַּסּ]] Ex 17:14 + 20 t., ´[[עַל־ס]] 2Sa 1:18 + 50 t. ( + Je 36:32; [[בַדְּיוֹ]] with ink v:Je 51:18), ´[[אֶל־ס]] † Je 30:2, Je 51:60; conversely ´[[דָּרַשׁ מֵעַל ס]] Is 34:16, ´[[שָׁמַע מֵעַל ס]] Je 36:11; v. also † [[וְיֻחָָקוּ]] ´[[בַּסּ]] Job 19:23 inscribe in a book, †[[חֻקָה]] ´[[עָל־ס]] Is 30:8 (‖[[כָּתְבָהּ עַל־לוּחַ]]); † ´[[מָחָה מִסּ]] blot out of a book Ex 32:32, Ex 32:33, Ps 69:29; † ´[[קָרָא אֶת־הַסּ]] Je 51:63 read the book, scroll, but usu. † ´[[קָרָא בְס]] Je 36:8, Je 36:10, Je 36:13, Ne 8:8, Ne 8:18, Ne 9:3, Ne 13:1].—´[[ס]] in ´[[קִרְיַת ס]], v. ´[[ק]] p. 900
